trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a method in the <see cref="N:System.Security.AccessControl" /> namespace attempts to enable a privilege that it does not have.
trans-unit.target: 當 <see cref="N:System.Security.AccessControl" /> 命名空間中的方法嘗試啟用本身沒有的權限時，所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The privilege that is not enabled.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException" /> class by using the specified privilege.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The privilege that is not enabled.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 參數不是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)，則會在處理內部例外狀況的 <see langword="catch" /> 區塊中引發目前的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException" /> class by using the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的例外狀況，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.PrivilegeNotHeldException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <paramref name="info" /> parameter with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況的相關資訊設定 <paramref name="info" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the privilege that is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得未啟用之權限的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the privilege that the method failed to enable.
trans-unit.target: 方法無法啟用之權限的名稱。
